Texts.Eng:
A sapient race of Orca-like people.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Health x^green;1.2^reset;, Max Food x^green;1.4^reset;
  ^green;2000^reset; Breath, ^green;70^reset; Breath Regen
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;30^reset;% Ice, +^green;20^reset;% Fire and Radiation
  ^cyan;Swim Boost 2^reset;
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Wet

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  ^green;Oceanic^reset; biomes: Health x^green;1.15^reset;, Energy x^green;1.2^reset;
  In water/healing water: -^green;50^reset;% Hunger Drain, +^green;20^reset;% Poison Resist, and ^cyan;minor health regen^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Boltgun: +^green;5^reset;% Crit Chance, +^green;2^reset; Crit Damage
  Trident: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance, +^green;5^reset;% Crit Damage
  Spear: Damage x^green;1.2^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;30^reset;% Electric, -^red;20^reset;% Poison
